name: Bits Clicker
description:
Do you want to play a simple and idle game?
Then Bits Clicker is for you!

This game is about collecting bits and upgrading your way up to be the richest man that has the most bits in the world!

Note: This game is still in early development and will receive huge updates down the line

Do you wanna know more and get some info while the game is developing?
You can join our discord server: https://discord.gg/k4XK4Ar4Wf

I hope you will have fun playing this game and have fun!
Main dev.
Sunset Cake
